sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import ReactDOM from 'react-dom'; import {useEffect, useState} from 'react'; import {Radio, Grid} from '@material-ui/core'; import { ethers } from 'ethers'; import './buy.css'; export default function Buy() { const [balance,setBalance]=useState(0); const [balance1,setBalance1]=useState(0); const [balance2,setBalance2]=useState(0); const handleAmount = async (e) =>{ setAmount(e.target.value) } const [amount, setAmount] = useState(0); return (
AVAILABLE BALANCE
Available ETH balance: {balance1}
Available USDT balance: {balance2}
Available ATRI balance: {balance}
YOUR TRANSACTION
Amount in ATRI:
Payment method:
handlePayStep(e,"1")} name="radio-button-demo" color = "primary" inputProps={{ 'aria-label': 'A' }} /> ETH handlePayStep(e,"2")} name="radio-button-demo" color = "primary" inputProps={{ 'aria-label': 'A' }} /> USDT
Amount in crypto: {`${returnValue}`} {payStep=="1"?"ETH":"USDT"}
); }
